1.content: So what will you start the "expansion" for the lovely Vixen?
1.title: The start

11.content: What does she wish for?
11.title: A wish

choices: for robin to be a girl
115.title: more

choices: She wonders what it feels like.
She does it to have Robin love her more.
1151.content: Is there any reason for Marian to want an hourglass body?
1151.title: Marian's new look.

choices: Everyone in the world is a fox.
1153.content: What else could Marian have wished for?
1153.title: Other options.

choices: No, let's try some more options.
11533.content: Does Marian want a more motherly tone to her physic? (Strong, but gentle, and a nice pair of bigger breasts than she had.)
11533.title: A Motherly Figure?

choices: To prepare for whenever she and Robin Hood have their fox family.
She wants to be more motherly to Skippy the Bunny. (After movie events.)
She has another reason for getting a motherly build. (Reader's choice.)
115331.content: Okay, so Marian is wishing to have a more motherly tone. But why is she Wishing this?
115331.title: A Motherly Vixen

choices: Hypnotized into being a harem girl.
Hypnotized into being a wet nurse for a large family.
Hypnotized into thinking her tits will shrink unless she does something about it
Hypnotized into thinking she suffers from a breast-related disease.
13.content: How on Earth does this even work? Hypnosis doesn't cause people's chest to grow, people... Unless Marian has some serious mental trouble caused...
13.title: Odd, but okay...

15.content: How does Marian become bigger?
15.title: Starting the story.

info.brief_description: A interactive of Maid Marian from Disney robin hood going trough some changes.
info.description:
--> PLEASE READ DESCRIPTION <--

Greetings viewers, I want to greet you all to this interactive about -Maid Marian- from Disney's Robin Hood.

This is a little interactive about Maid Marian going through some changes (mainly Breast expansion, Expansion, weight gain, flattenings, & transformations) and if anyone is on www.furaffinity.net you my have seen "wolfjedisamuel" comic "Robin Boobs" ( warning nude: http://d.facdn.net/art/wolfjedisamuel/1284049079/1284049079.wolfjedisamuel_robin... )

What's aloud: Breast expansion, Belly expansion, Butt expansion, Body expansion, lactation/milking.

What's not aloud: Scat, vomiting, waterworks/piss, Gender changing (unless you turn Robin to a vixen then it's alright)

Have fun. ;)
